1.0.name: wordpress/create-new-blog-notice
1.0.description: New users often do not know where to start when it with Wordpress. This plugin places a bright yellow button at the top of the dashboard to guide the user to the place to create their first blog. After the user has made a blog the button dissapears. This plugin is configured to run in Wordpress network. Plugin may need modification to run on standalone install of wordpress.
